ShowProgress.Description: Prints progress of application to standard output.

PrintToScreen.Description: Captured information will be printed to the standard console.

Format.Description: Captured information will be exported in the specified 'Format'.

Directory.Description: This is going to be the output path of exported files

Time.Description: Data will be exported once for every 'Value' mili seconds.

Count.Description: Data will be exported for every 'Value' records captured.

Size.Description: Data will be exported for every 'Value' Bytes of information captured.
